new_in_paras: Are you new in Paras? Learn more and get started

1.title: New in Paras?
1.description: Paras is all-in-one social NFT marketplace for creators & collectors that use <DescLink>Near Wallet</DescLink>

2.title: Have Artwork?
2.description: Share your artworks or project as NFTs then get profit from sales and future royalty fee

3.title: Want to get profit?
3.description: Hunt the rarest and most wanted collection of NFTs and become the <DescLink>Apex Collector</DescLink>

4.title: Like what you see?
4.description: Support the artist you like by share their page in Paras. The more view will make the artist gain reputation

join.title: Want to chat to your fellow creators, collectors, or Parasâ€™ team?

token.title: $PARAS Token
token.description: PARAS is a utility token that lets you shape the future of Paras ecosystem and at the same time gives you more rewards and benefits.

staking.title: $PARAS Staking
staking.description: Paras loyalty is a special program created to appreciate $PARAS stakers by giving exclusive access to limited raffles.
staking.tagline: Join Paras Loyalty & Get Excellent Reward!

sweep_floor.title: Sweep Floor
sweep_floor.description: You can buy faster up to 10 lowest-price cards.

card4card.title: Card4Card
card4card.description: Invite your friends to join the event, make new friends, and attract collectors to Paras! Goodluck!
card4card.tagline_one: Swap your NFT with your fellow creators or collectors at a low price.
